mapper.select: select * from tbl_replyes where board_no = #{boardNo} order by reply_no

select r.* from (select rownum rn, a.* from (select * from tbl_replyes where board_no = #{boardNo} order by reply_no desc) a
where rownum <= (#{rpage} * 5)) r
where r.rn > (#{rpage} - 1) * 5
